description:
Lists dependencies (exports + symbols) of .exe and .dll files like MSVCR90.dll or VCRUNTIME140.dll.
	
	The pedeps Cross-platform C library provides functions to retrieve data from Windows .exe and .dll files.

These files are in either PE (Windows 32-bit) or PE+ (Windows 64-bit) format, which are extensions of the COFF format.
Currently the library allows iterating through:
 - exported symbols
 - imported symbols from dependancy .dll files
summary: Lists dependencies (exports + symbols) of .exe and .dll files like MSVCR90.dll or VCRUNTIME140.dll.
author: Brecht Sanders
